description: Multi-party marriage contract supporting 2-10 parties with proportional asset distribution

divorce_conditions.description: Majority of parties must consent to divorce

notes: Divorce threshold is calculated as majority (n/2 + 1)
Asset split is proportional to number of parties
All parties must sign for marriage to be valid
example_usage: anubis-notary marriage init --template polygamy --parties "Alice,Bob,Carol" --jurisdiction US-UT -o marriage.json
